headline: Will Prisma Access Browser be Key to PANW's SASE Expansion?
summary: Palo Alto Networks' SASE ARR surges 36% as Prisma Access Browser drives seat growth and builds a strong nine-figure sales pipeline.

headline: Fortinet Strengthens Code-to-Cloud Security with CNAPP Enhancements and Launches Expanded Solution Availability in AWS Marketplace
